Code up the objective function

```{r}
sample_mixture <- function(n,mu,sigma,prob){
  pj <- rbinom(n,1,prob)
  x <- rep(0,n)
  x[pj==1]<- rnorm(sum(pj==1),mu,sigma)
  return(x)
}
set.seed(47)
y<-sample_mixture(10000,0,.5,.5)
z <- entropy::discretize(y,1000)
S<-entropy::entropy(z)
S
```
